name: BROT
description: Blockrot ($BROT) is the first tokenized, interactive 3D AI agent livestreamer and gamer. The project merges AI and gaming technology with the decentralized culture of Web3, offering real-time community interaction, co-creation and engagement. Its primary purpose is to build groundbreaking technology within an engaging, community-driven ecosystem where participants can co-create Blockrot and shape future innovations.
